FRONTLINE - Additional Guns:
Adding 3 new machine guns with new sounds (extracted from wartime recordings): - Lewis Gun - DP 1928 - Browning M2
All of these guns work with the FRONTLINE - Trenches. These new guns take less time to reload / aka shoot again, but got less bullets per burst. So they can select a new target faster, but the traditional guns (MG 08/15, MG-34, MG-42) spam more bullets for supression. Choice is yours!
Hope you enjoy it, feel free to leave a comment!
IMPORTANT: Load Additional guns after Trenches.
